text: This is just my opinion, but not really.  We’ve already unleashed world-changing effects and we can’t unring that bell.  We can, however, adapt as humanity has always adapted.  Life will be harder for a while, but eventually we’ll have rebuilt our world.  It won’t be the same, but if we rebuild with past mistakes in mind maybe it will be better.
It’s still great.  It’s just not going to be the planet to which we have grown accustomed.
